Component.Name: emul32
Component.Summary: 32-bit packages for use on amd64 and ia64 systems
Component.Description: 32-bit emulation packages are needed to run 32-bit applications on amd64 and ia64 systems.

Component.Name: programming
Component.Description: Programming libraries, tools, debuggers, profilers, etc.

Component.Name: kernel.default.drivers
Component.Summary: Kernel drivers for the default kernel

Component.Name: kernel.pae
Component.Description: PAE enabled 32-bit kernel which allows modern processors to use up to 64GB physical memory

Component.Name: kernel.pae.drivers
Component.Summary: Kernel drivers for PAE enabled 32-bit kernel flavour

Component.Name: kernel.rt.drivers
Component.Summary: Kernel drivers for real-time kernel flavour

Component.Name: kernel
Component.Description: kernel component contains the linux kernel for Pardus and related kernel drivers
